message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. It's a valuable piece and I believe this price reflects its true worth. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $750,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $750,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $825,000, which I believe is a fair compromise. Let's meet in the middle and make this deal happen.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your perspective, I still cannot justify spending more than $775,000 on this product. I would like to propose $775,000 as a reasonable price for us both.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $775,000 is still a bit too low.  I'm willing to come down to $800,000, which is my absolute minimum. If you're unable to meet this price, I'll have to explore other options.
